## IErrorBarsCustomValues.XMinus property

Specifies the error bar value in the negative direction. Avalible if error bars value type is Custom and ErrorBarsXFormat is allowed. In any other case this property returns null. Read-only [`IDoubleChartValue`](../../idoublechartvalue).

```csharp
public IDoubleChartValue XMinus { get; }
```
